duaas.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duaas.translation: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

duaas.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِن نَّسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا
duaas.translation: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred.

duaas.arabic: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي
duaas.translation: My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance] and ease for me my task.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْهُدَى وَالتُّقَى وَالْعَفَافَ وَالْغِنَى
duaas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity and self-sufficiency.

duaas.arabic: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
duaas.translation: O Turner of the hearts, keep my heart firm upon Your religion.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
duaas.translation: O Allah, You are Forgiving and love forgiveness, so forgive me.

duaas.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
duaas.translation: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ، وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
duaas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from worry and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, from being heavily in debt and from being overpowered by (other) men.

duaas.arabic: رَبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duaas.translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
duaas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and from the punishment of Hell-fire, and from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of Dajjal.

duaas.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
duaas.translation: Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
duaas.translation: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You in an excellent manner.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ
duaas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and I seek refuge in You from the Fire.

duaas.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
duaas.translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, for You are the Acceptor of Repentance, the Merciful.

duaas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
duaas.translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي وَزِدْنِي عِلْمًا
duaas.translation: O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me, and teach me that which will benefit me, and increase me in knowledge.

duaas.arabic: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلَاةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِي رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاءِ
duaas.translation: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.

duaas.arabic: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ وَارْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
duaas.translation: My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful.

duaas.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
duaas.translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
duaas.translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit, a good provision, and deeds that will be accepted.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ يَا مُصَرِّفَ الْقُلُوبِ صَرِّفْ قُلُوبَنَا عَلَى طَاعَتِكَ
duaas.translation: O Allah, Director of hearts, direct our hearts to Your obedience.

duaas.arabic: رَبَّنَا اصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
duaas.translation: Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering.

duaas.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالصَّالِحِينَ
duaas.translation: My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكُفْرِ وَالْفَقْرِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ
duaas.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty, and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave.

duaas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَصْلِحْ لِي دِينِي الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي
duaas.translation: O Allah, set right for me my religion which is the safeguard of my affairs, and set right for me the affairs of my world wherein is my living.
